errors.JWT_NOT_FOUND: JWT not found as url query parameter.
errors.NOT_A_JWT: JWT does not appear to be a property formatted JWT.
errors.MALFORMED_JWT_CLAIMS: The JWT claims section is malfomed and could not be decoded as JSON.
errors.NO_AUTH_TOKEN_HEADER: HTTP response does not contain Authorization header.
errors.INVALID_AUTH_TOKEN_HEADER: HTTP response has an invalid Authorization header.
errors.INITIAL_JWT_REJECTED: The JWT used to initialized the client was rejected.
